asmt_metric.question: Q For Question Bank
asmt_metric.script: // The following variables are available: // - primary: contains the sys_id of the assessable object to be evaluated // - string_result: the script sets the display string value for this metric to this variable // - actual_result: the script sets the actual value for this metric to this variable // - scaled_result: the script sets the scaled value (used in calculations) for this metric to this variable // // For example: // var gr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci'); // gr.addQuery('manufacturer', primary); // gr.query(); // actual_result = gr.getRowCount(); // string_result = actual_result + ''; // if (actual_result > 100) scaled_result = 5; // else scaled_result = 1;
